author: mheathsmith
title: Southampton vs Leicester team news and line-ups: Virgil van Dijk passed fit to start for Southampton as the Foxes come to town
text:
EFL TEAM NEWS Southampton vs Leicester team news and line-ups: Virgil van Dijk passed fit to start for Southampton as the Foxes come to town 
All you need to know ahead of Leicester City's trip to St Mary's By Joe Ball Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments CLAUDE PUEL has been given a huge boost after Virgil Van Dijk was passed fit to start for Southampton who host Leicester today. 
With Jose Fonte having left the club to join West Ham in an £8million deal , The Saints will have been desperate for their highly-rated centre-half to start. The teams are in! 
— Southampton FC (@SouthamptonFC) January 22, 2017 Today’s starting XI: Schmeichel, Simpson, Morgan (c), Huth, Fuchs, Ndidi, Mendy, Drinkwater, Gray, Okazaki, Vardy. #SouLei pic.twitter.com/hLcJIHq5jR 
— Leicester City (@LCFC) January 22, 2017 Getty Images 4 Virgil van Dijk has been passed fit to start for Southampton as they entertain Leicester today (Sunday) 
Leicester travel to St Mary’s with a fully fit squad apart from Leonardo Ulloa who misses out with injury again. 
Claude Puel’s side have lost four on the spin as they slipped into mid-table – but do have a stronger home record than away. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Southampton and Leicester City news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary What is the latest Southampton team news? 
The Saints are in the midst of a minor injury crisis, but key defenders Virgil van Dijk and Ryan Bertrand have both been passed fit. Who is definitely out for Southampton? 
Out: Austin, Targett, Pied, McCarthy, Boufal What is the latest Leicester team news? 
Leicester have a fully fit squad except for striker Leonardo Ulloa, who has a thigh problem. 
But they are without Daniel Amartey, Islam Slimani and crucially Riyad Mahrez, who are all of AFCON duty in Gabon. PA:Press Association Leonardo Ulloa is out for Leicester after missing the 3-0 defeat to Chelsea Who is definitely out for Leicester? 
Out: Mahrez, Slimani, Amartey Who is going to win – latest odds? 
Southampton – 10/11
